price: (108) And they say, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, the promise of our Lord has been fulfilled."
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِن كَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفۡعُولٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna sub'ḥāna rabbinā in kāna waʿdu rabbinā lamafʿūlan
